news.title: Jackbox Utility
news.content:
# This is the new version of Jackbox Utility!

In this new version, the English language is added to the application.

Enjoy!

news.title: Join our Discord server!
news.content:
# You need help? Wanna play some games?

Join our Discord server! You can also suggest features for the Utility.

<https://discord.gg/CBTaTGx2zy>

news.title: Game codes on EU/Canada!
news.smallDescription: You can now buy game codes in EU and Canada!
news.content:
# If you're looking to buy the Jackbox games in these locations, you're in luck!

When buying game codes in jackboxgames.com, you now get exclusive discounts in Europe and Canada, as well as in the United States.

Happy buying!
